name: Belarus
startIntroPart1: Welcome to Belarus, the People Republic!
declaringWar: We're tired of disputes, enough! Prepare for war!
attacked: Are you gonna to grab our lands? Come on, get it!
defeated: You are disgusting! How dare you...
introduction: Hello there, my name is Vaclau, I am presenting Belarus!
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: May be peace between our nations. Zhyve Belarus!
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in this exchange?

name: Georgia
startIntroPart1: Fierce Tamar, only a fool could misjudge Georgia's true measure. Hound your enemies with loyal clansmen who strike from the hills. Encourage your foes to dash their best against your cities' enduring walls.
startIntroPart2: The armies of your protectorates will run them down as they flee. If you suffer no fools, great queen, Georgia will not suffer.
declaringWar: God fights with us. You stand alone.
attacked: Georgian hearts will not tremble before your multitudes.
defeated: Walls weren't enough to save Georgia from ruin. Neither was I.
introduction: I am Tamar of Georgia. Say what you will and be on your way.
tradeRequest: Our folks offers this deal to you. Do you accept?
uniques: [+33]% [Culture] [in all non-occupied cities] <during a Golden Age>
[+33]% [Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <during a Golden Age>
[+200]% Production when constructing [Walls] buildings [in all cities]
